title: Portia
description: Don't miss this special edition with an all-new honeymoon epilogue!!!Unlike her famous older brother Maxon, Princess Portia isn't known for killing demons or attracting admirers. The reason why is simple: a spell was cast on Portia, and the magic has marked her to one day transform into a dreaded Void demon. To break the curse, the bookworm princess must hit the battlefield. Her only chance? A handsome dragon who just happens to be a greater demon of lust and wrath. It’s a fight against both deadly enemies and her heart’s desires. Angelbound Offspring1. Maxon 2. Portia3. Zinnia 4. Rhodes (Dec 2019) 5. Kaps (Summer 2020) 5. Huntress
author: Christina Bauer
